name: Dreams in the Witch House Bundle
name_original: Dreams in the Witch House Bundle
description:
Dreams in the Witch House
Dreams in the Witch House is a unique mix of classic point and click adventure and open world RPG. The gameplay is nonlinear and many of the elements are generated randomly, making each playthrough different. Dreams in the Witch House Soundtrack
Dreams in the Witch House Original Soundtrack composed by Troy Sterling Nies. Contains 21 tracks from the game and three bonus tracks.
